pkgmetadata.longdescription: Knockoffs for Hidden Markov Models and Genomic Data // Generates knockoff variables from discrete Markov chains and hidden Markov models, with specific support for genomic data. For more information, see the website below and the accompanying paper: Sesia et al., "Gene Hunting with Knockoffs for Hidden Markov Models", 2017, arXiv:1706.04677.
